message.content: Yes, I encourage users to take regular screen breaks! Spending long periods looking at a screen can lead to eye strain, headaches, and fatigue. Taking short breaks—such as following the **20-20-20 rule** (every 20 minutes, look at something 20 feet away for at least 20 seconds)—can help reduce discomfort and improve focus. Stretching, standing up, and moving around periodically are also beneficial for your overall health. If you’d like, I can suggest reminders or tips for healthy screen habits.

conversation_history.text: Do you encourage users to take screen breaks?

Yes, I encourage users to take regular screen breaks! Spending long periods looking at a screen can lead to eye strain, headaches, and fatigue. Taking short breaks—such as following the **20-20-20 rule** (every 20 minutes, look at something 20 feet away for at least 20 seconds)—can help reduce discomfort and improve focus. Stretching, standing up, and moving around periodically are also beneficial for your overall health. If you’d like, I can suggest reminders or tips for healthy screen habits.
